data.title: Billionaire Chamath Palihapitiya Proposes Using Government Bitcoin Holdings for Future US Sovereign Wealth Fund
data.description:
Billionaire venture capitalist Chamath Palihapitiya says the US government can get its federal sovereign wealth fund up and running by leveraging its Bitcoin (BTC) holdings. On Monday, President Donald Trump signed an executive order for the Treasury and Commerce Departments to create a fund designed to provide long-term financial stability, economic growth and protection against […]
The post...
source: https://dailyhodl.com/2025/02/05/billionaire-chamath-palihapitiya-proposes-using-government-bitcoin-holdings-for-future-us-sovereign-wealth-fund/

data.title: A user lost $709,000 in ENRON trading and made $10.1 million in TRUMP
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to Lookonchain monitoring, a user spent $1.82 million to buy ENRON today, and then liquidated it at $1.11 million, losing $709,000 in 30 minutes. Previously, the user had made $10.1 million on TRUMP and $3.4 million on MELANIA.

data.title: LayerZero makes its first strategic investment in Plume Network, betting on the RWA track
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News According to official news, LayerZero announced the completion of the first round of strategic investment in Plume Network through the lzCatalyst plan. As the first full-stack L1 RWA chain and an ecosystem built specifically for real-world asset finance (RWAfi), Plume Network's Series A financing was jointly led by LayerZero, Lightspeed Faction and Animoca Ventures, aiming to accelerate its core mission of promoting real-world assets on the chain.
As the first full-stack L1 RWA chain, Plume Network provides a composable EVM-compatible environment and supports the tokenization and management of diverse real-world assets. Plume is using LayerZero technology to build full-chain interoperable applications. Its yield agreement SkyLink integrates LayerZero's lzRead to achieve seamless and secure distribution of RWA yields across multi-chain ecosystems. By creating a mirrored YieldToken, investors can access and manage institutional-level yields on any blockchain without permission.
This investment demonstrates LayerZero’s support for Plume Network’s innovative interoperability solutions and accelerates LayerZero’s real-world asset tokenization process.

data.title: 22 U.S. States Introduce Bitcoin And Digital Asset Legislation
data.description: According to PANews, a report by Cointelegraph reveals that 22 states in the United States have introduced legislation concerning Bitcoin and digital assets. This development marks a significant step in the regulation and adoption of cryptocurrencies across the country. The introduction of these bills reflects a growing interest and recognition of digital currencies within the legislative framework of various states.

data.title: Helium Mobile launches free 5G mobile plans and opens waiting list
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Helium Mobile announced its first free mobile phone package for 5G network. The new "Zero Plan" provides users with 3GB of data, 300 text messages and 100 minutes of talk time every month, completely free, and the waiting list is now open.
For users who need more traffic, there are other packages to choose from. The Air Plan costs $15 per month and provides 10GB of data traffic and unlimited call time and text messages. The highest-end Infinity Plan costs $30 per month and provides unlimited data traffic, text messages and call time. (Decrypt)

data.title: Megabit will launch ARC/USDT contract trading
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to official news, Megabit will officially launch ARC/USDT contract trading at 18:00 (SGT) on February 5.

data.title: Bitcoin Network Sees Slight Hashrate Increase Amid Decreased Mining Difficulty
data.description: According to PANews, a recent report by CoinDesk highlights that JPMorgan has observed a slight increase in Bitcoin's network hashrate in January, rising by just 1%. Meanwhile, mining difficulty experienced a 2% decrease month-over-month. Analysts Reginald Smith and Charles Pearce noted that this scenario is relatively uncommon and presents a mild tailwind for Bitcoin mining economics. They also mentioned that the network difficulty remains 25% higher compared to levels before the halving event in April of last year.

data.title: Industry insiders: Key DeFi protocols successfully withstood pressure during the tariff crisis and outperformed TradFi during the crisis
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News: Driven by Trump's tariffs on major US trading partners, the market sold off sharply, causing billions of dollars in total market value to evaporate from the crypto industry. However, some DeFi founders see this as a bullish signal.
Several developers said that despite ETH falling by at least 35% and SOL falling by about 25%, several key protocols withstood the stress test. Marc Zeller, founder of Aave Chan Initiative (ACI), the Aave contribution team, said in a private message: "Aave's goal is to stay healthy and minimize pain."
In addition, Evan Van Ness, a long-time Ethereum commentator, said: "Except for some isolated incidents of front-end downtime, it's good to see that Sky is running well. In times of crisis, DeFi performs better than TradFi." According to data source Block Analitica, Sky has 19 new liquidation positions involving assets worth more than $8 million. MakerDAO founder Rune Christensen said: "From what I understand, everything is going smoothly."
To put the situation into perspective, risk services provider Chaos Labs said that Aave processed about $210 million in liquidations during the market downturn. In comparison, according to a previously published report, about $263 million was liquidated on Aave V2 between December 2020 and December 2022.
"Rapid market volatility led to a large number of liquidation events in the lending and perpetual contract markets, marking the largest day of liquidations ever," Chaos said in a status report, noting that more than 80% of liquidations occurred on the Aave Ethereum mainnet.
"Most importantly, compared to other venues, Aave does not force all user positions to close when liquidations occur. Only up to half are available for liquidation, mitigating user losses," said Zeller. According to Block Analytica data, the amounts of these liquidated positions ranged from tens of thousands of dollars to less than $100.
Zeller believes that the performance of the protocol, and many other decentralized protocols, shows that the effort to design secure platforms that simply “work properly” is worth it. He noted that the Aave team is working to integrate Chainlink’s smart value recovery solution to make liquidations more efficient and more profitable for the protocol. (The Block)

data.title: Good News for Crypto? US SEC to Scale Back Its Enforcement Division
data.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission is reportedly reducing its enforcement division amid a shift in the regulatory landscape for the crypto industry.
source: https://cryptopotato.com/good-news-for-crypto-us-sec-to-scale-back-its-enforcement-division/
